Massive kudos to the uploader. The torrent is one hundred percent clean and works perfectly. If you come up against a fatal error during installation, you might wish to upgrade to the latest version of Windows Installer, which you may download for free from Microsoft Download Center. In case you get a fatal error or an Error 1628 after one or more interrupted or failed installations, just use Task Manager to kill all instances of msiexec.exe, as sometimes Windows Installer does not fully close, thus preventing any other installations from being run. That will most likely do the trick. Just a heads-up: if you have a newer ATI graphics card (4xxx, 5xxx), do yourself a favour and DO NOT install the patch, or the game will freeze at the splash screen. Furthermore, Microsoft Visual C++ 2002 Redistributable Package (actually, MSVCP71.DLL and MSVCR71.DLL) and Microsoft .NET Framework 1.1 or newer are required for the game to work properly. Both can be downloaded for free from the aforementioned Microsoft Download Center. If the game still freezes or crashes, make sure Lighting Quality isn't set to Very High - on some graphics cards, any setting other than Low makes indoor scenery abnormally dark, so yeah, bear that in mind. Enthusiasts, feel free to keep it on Very High and just change r_Quality_BumpMapping to 2. If nothing of this solves your problem, do read the ReadMe file. It can be rather useful. Also, make sure your DirectX and graphics drivers are up to date. If you still can't get it to work, you probably are:
a) 12 or younger (see b)
b) intellectually inferior to your average gorilla
c) using an x64 version of Vista (see b)
d) an owner of a machine that's at least a decade old (see b, not because the machine's old, but for trying to run FC on it)...
...so give up. You ain't running it. Hope that helps. Cheers. Thanks again for the awesome torrent. Will seed for a long time.

-TM

I guess the instructions should've been a bit clearer - that would enable those who are new to piracy to install the game easily, as well as the hardcore ones. The cracked .exe is supposed to be put into the bin subfolder inside the install directory, not directly into the folder where you'd installed Far Cry (e.g. if you installed it to C:\Program Files\Ubisoft\Crytek\Far Cry, put the .exe inside C:\Program Files\Ubisoft\Crytek\Far_Cry\bin). Hope that helps. Cheers.

to enable HDR, open console with ~ key and type
(make sure that antialiasing is disabled)

r_HDRRendering = 1 [Enter]
r_HDRFake = 0 [Enter]

or better
r_HDRRendering = 7
